title: Please, check my new font...
content:
I designed a font strongly based in "bruggenletter" (the letter of the bridges in Amsterdam).   
   
You can check it at:   
 [http://www.geocities.com/sinserif/mariabrug.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020191216/http:/www.geocities.com/sinserif/mariabrug.gif)   
   
Any report or opinion will be welcome.   
   
Ramiro Espinoza.
author: anonymous

comments.content:
wrong forum...   
   
Use the critique forum please.

If the link doesn't work, please, cut and paste this one in the browser...   
   
 [http://www.geocities.com/sinserif/mariabrug.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020191216/http:/www.geocities.com/sinserif/mariabrug.htm)   
   
Ramiro.
